creditline: The Marilyn C. Benson Endowment for Art Acquisition
description: resting cow laying on straw, with its head pulled back toward PL, near a corner; walls decorated with panels with painterly triangular shapes in rectangles, with zigzag lines above and between; round holes in wall above cow
inscription: on back in black ink: PHY.00898 | on back in black and blue ink: JYOTI BHATT / 7-CHAROTAR SOC. / OLD PADRA ROAD / VADODARA 390020
signed: on back in black ink: Jyoti Bhatt | on back in blue ink: A corner of a Village House - M.P. 1983
title: Interior of a Rajawar tribal house, Madhya Pradesh
